blogPost.title: What role does ownership play in protecting the environment and saving the planet? Answer by @LawHeller, Professor @ColumbiaLaw, author of MINE!. https://t.co/3hHmXq7UAz https://t.co/g4y8VWf2ny
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 所有权在保护环境、拯救地球方面有什么作用？由《MINE！》一书的作者@哥伦比亚法学教授LawHeller回答。https://t.co/3hHmXq7UAz https://t.co/g4y8VWf2ny。
所有權在保護環境、拯救地球方面有什麼作用？由《MINE！》一書的作者@哥倫比亞法學教授LawHeller回答。https://t.co/3hHmXq7UAz https://t.co/g4y8VWf2ny。

previous.title: What should all first-time homebuyers know that can make the process easier? Answer by Bill Walker, Chief Revenue Officer at Unison. https://t.co/BqZig5tIUY https://t.co/6m4ruSrwkY

localize.full_text: 所有的首次购房者都应该知道什么可以使这个过程变得更容易？由Unison公司首席收入官Bill Walker回答。https://t.co/BqZig5tIUY https://t.co/6m4ruSrwkY。
所有的首次購房者都應該知道什麼可以使這個過程變得更容易？由Unison公司首席收入官Bill Walker回答。https://t.co/BqZig5tIUY https://t.co/6m4ruSrwkY。
